  • The job has been cancelled

title: Password reset
body:
Hello!


With the following link you can reset your password:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

How to Get Started

1. List a product

It is FREE to list products on TechieStore (other marketplaces charge you money to list products, but not us)! The listings with the best photos and descriptions are the ones that sell the best, so you'll want to ensure that:

  • The photos are very high quality and clearly show the product both up close and from several different angles.
  • The description is thorough and clear.

2. Add shipping rates

TechieStore customers are in over 80 countries around the world (and growing)! To ensure that everyone who wants to buy your products can, you should have shipping rates for United States (US), European Union (EU) and Everywhere Else. The "Everywhere Else" shipping rate will cover any countries you don't explicitly set. You can add shipping rates for specific countries if it is particularly expensive or inexpensive to ship to those locations.

3. Add store info

At the heart of TechieStore is a very passionate community, and buyers want to learn more about the sellers making the products. Sellers who include a photo and information about their store sell more products. So please include information about yourself and your business - your photo, location, and a description about yourself. We'd love to meet you!

4. Accept orders

Once an order comes in, we'll email you a link with the order details. No need to keep checking Tindie (unless you want to)!

5. Ship your order

When you receive the email about the order, we include information about the shipping rate the buyer selected. After you mail the order, you then mark the order as shipped on Tindie -- that way we can notify the customer the order is on the way.

6. Get paid

New sellers will have their disbursements available 30 days after their first order ships. Afterwards, disbursements are available, via our payout system, after orders have been shipped. We automatically pay you every 30 days via PayPal, but if you would like to be paid more frequently just head over to the Disbursement section of My Orders and request to be paid!

Start Selling

Have more questions? Check the TechieStore FAQ.

Powered by VQ MARKETPLACE

VQ Marketplace will enable you to start and configure your Marketplace, get you on the market quickly and test your business idea.


Start your FREE marketplace
